mapper.select: select board_no, title, content, writer, view_cnt, creation_date from tbl_board order by board_no desc

select c.* from (select rownum rn, b.* from (select * from tbl_board where
title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
writer like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or writer like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by board_no DESC) b
where rownum <= #{page}*5) c --꺽쇠는 연산자가 아닌 태그로 인식해서 jsp에서 그래서 cdata태그를 넣어줌
where c.rn > (#{page}-1)*5 --페이지 넣어서 탐색
select board_no, title, content, writer, view_cnt, creation_date, image from tbl_board where board_no = #{boardNo}

select count(1) from tbl_board where
title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
writer like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or writer like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
